content:
In table view, click on the date in the column heading.

Or use the View menu > sort by.

In Windows, you may have to press <alt> to see the menu bar.
creator: mozilla98

content: It's a fixed bug which hasn't landed yet. Until it does, disable automatic compacting.

content: Thanks. I can live with that until the next landing.

content: Tieto: - Celé meno pod ktorým chcete vystupovať - emailová adresa - typ servera: IMAP, alebo POP - názov servera: IMAP, alebo POP - port servera - bezpečnostné nastavenia pre "Zabezpečenie spojenia" a pre "Metódu overenia"
